The Exchange, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market place so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded, had written to the company. title: Madhya Bharat Agro Products Limited
summary: Madhya Bharat Agro Products Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Pursuant to the MCA Circulars and SEBI Circulars issued from time to time, the 28th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Madhya Bharat Agro Products Limited will be held on Tuesday, the 02nd day of September...
fullContent: Madhya Bharat Agro Products Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Pursuant to the MCA Circulars and SEBI Circulars issued from time to time, the 28th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Madhya Bharat Agro Products Limited will be held on Tuesday, the 02nd day of September 2025 at 03:00 P.M (IST) through Video Conferencing / Other Audio- Visual Means ( VC / OAVM ) only without Physical presence of the members at the venue (Deemed Venue for Meeting is Registered Office at Wing A/1, 1st Floor, Ostwal Heights, Urban Forest, Atun, Bhilwara 311802 to transact the business as set out in the notice.The Notice of the AGM and Annual Report for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2025 will be sent to all shareholders whose email addresses are registered with the Company/ Depository Participant(s) and will also be available on the Company's website at www.mbapl.com in due course.'. |SUBJECT: Updates
